title: Night Owl

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, watch a player's ballot box. If they received three or more votes, learn the roles of all players who voted for them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the day, you cannot talk, your ability will be processed at the end of the day, and you cannot vote.
- During the night, you can talk in the day chat, send whispers, and place votes on players. In addition, votes during night are always decided via plurality.
- If you gain extra abilities or attributes that apply during the day, they instead apply at night, and vice versa.
